title: BLACK SABBATH Take The Stage For The Last Time With OZZY OSBOURNE At Back To The Beginning
description: The end of an era. The post BLACK SABBATH Take The Stage For The Last Time With OZZY OSBOURNE At Back To The Beginning appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 3 hours ago
text: It's to be expected – hell, the entire gig is a farewell to Black Sabbath and Ozzy Osbourne, but it still feels surreal when it's over. Black Sabbath have just played their last show with Ozzy Osbourne tonight (5th July) in Birmingham, England at their Back To The Beginning celebration. Taking to the stage after Osbourne's five-track solo performance, Black Sabbath also performed four tracks of their own. You can check out each song below. Thank you, to the grandfathers of metal. You will be missed. Black Sabbath1. "War Pigs"2. "N.I.B."3, "Iron Man"4. "Paranoid" Want More Metal? html:
It's to be expected – hell, the entire gig is a farewell to Black Sabbath and Ozzy Osbourne, but it still feels surreal when it's over. Black Sabbath have just played their last show with Ozzy Osbourne tonight (5th July) in Birmingham, England at their Back To The Beginning celebration.

Taking to the stage after Osbourne's five-track solo performance, Black Sabbath also performed four tracks of their own. You can check out each song below.

Thank you, to the grandfathers of metal. You will be missed.

Black Sabbath
1. "War Pigs"
2. "N.I.B."
3, "Iron Man"
4. "Paranoid"
